articles.title: Noida Twin Towers Demolition Highlights: Noida Twin Tower Demolition Went As Planned, Say Officials
articles.description: The Supertech twin towers in Noida were brought down today in a massive explosion. The bringing down of the towers, lasting about nine seconds, gives moral victory to residents of Supertech Emerald Court in Sector 93A.
articles.content:
Noida Twin Tower: The demolition was carried out using 3,700 kg of explosives. (File)
Noida: The Supertech twin towers in Noida were brought down today in a massive explosion. The bringing down of t… [+11492 chars]

articles.title: JEE Advanced 2022 Updates: Second shift concludes; Organic Chemistry rated difficult
articles.description: JEE Advanced 2022 Exam Live Updates: The exam was held in two shifts today — the morning shift was scheduled between 9 am and 12 pm, and the afternoon shift started at 2:30 pm and concluded at 5:30 pm.

articles.title: Rahul Gandhi or a new face? Congress to elect its president on October 17
articles.description: The notification for Congress president's election will be issued on September 22, while the filing of nomination will begin on September 24 and continue till September 30. The election, if required, will take place on October 17. | Latest News India

articles.title: Sonali Phogat death: How meth might have caused heart failure
articles.description: ‘Methamphetamine on its own might not cause the heart attack but it can result in a cardiac arrest if consumed in an excess quantity. The recreational drugs can lead to over sedation, which can affect the organs, including the heart,’ says expert
